channel.title: TtocsNeb
channel.description: A blog containing my personal projects.

item.title: RC Remote Software
item.description: I am done building my RC Remote and have started developing the software for both the comms library, as well as the remote itself.

item.title: WeatherStation: Software
item.description: I started planning the software structure

item.title: Weather Station Part 2
item.description: I have started working on the main board for the station. Adding the transceiver, barometer, temperature, and humidity sensor.

item.title: Weather Station
item.description: I am starting a weather station project, taking an old broken weather station, and getting it to work with Arduino and a Raspberry Pi web server.

item.title: Lord of the Flies 1
item.description: In English class, we have been reading The Lord of the Flies. We are assigned to write about how our actions relate to characters in the book.
